item.title: 1477.Find Two Non-overlapping Sub-arrays Each With Target Sum-找出两个元素和为目标数且无交集的子数组
item.description: 问题描述 Given an array of integers arr and an integer target. You have to find two non-overlapping sub-arrays of arr each with sum equal target. There can be multiple answers so you have to find an answer where the sum of the lengths of the two sub-arrays is minimum. Return the minimum sum of the lengths of the two required sub-arrays, or return -1 if you cannot
